name: Antelope Super Spreader
description:
How to play:

Use arrow keys to move

First find the bat on the level (its grey and pink), then proceed to infect all of the npc humans before the timer runs out to progress to a marginally more difficult level.

------

Play as a terminally-ill antelope with just 45 seconds of survival left.

People are outside breaching their local lockdown, your final mission is to punish them by first finding a bat to consume, and then spreading it to as many people as possible.

Miraculously, spreading the virus to everyone on a level will give you 45 more seconds to live. for whatever reason, after every level you complete, even more people leave their houses and break their local lockdown.

downplay the problem of people breaking their local lockdown by causing an even bigger problem of your own, for you are the antelope super-spreader.
